snippet: Lona Nallengara, a veteran of the agency and the S.E.C. chairwoman’s chief of staff, often played the role of Ms. White’s ambassador.
lead_paragraph: Lona Nallengara, a veteran of the agency and the S.E.C. chairwoman’s chief of staff, often played the role of Ms. White’s ambassador.

headline.main: Top Aide to S.E.C. Chairwoman Mary Jo White to Step Down From Post
headline.print_headline: Top Aide to S.E.C. Chairwoman Mary Jo White to Step Down From Post
